text: The Albanian Basketball First Division is the men's second tier basketball league in Albania. It is the lower division of the Albanian Basketball League which is organised by the Albanian Basketball Association.Shkodra Sport ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" |- !Season !Champion !Runner-up !Score !class="unsortable"| |- |align=center|2003 |Skënderbeu |Partizani |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2005 |Flamurtari |BC Teuta Durrës |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2006 |Apolonia |Skënderbeu |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2010 |UAT |Flamurtari |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2014 |Flamurtari |Partizani |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2015 |Teuta |UAT |align="center"|— | |- |align=center|2016 |Ardhmëria |Superior |align="center"|— | Ardhmëria kampione e Kategorisë së Parë |- |} ==See also== * Albanian Basketball League * Albanian Basketball Cup * Albanian Basketball Supercup ==References== 2 Albania Category:1946 establishments in Albania Category:Sports leagues established in 1946
